    • getOcspResponderURL

      public static @Nullable String getOcspResponderURL(X509Certificate cert)
      Extracts the OCSP Responder URL from the given certificate if specified. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Online_Certificate_Status_Protocol
      Returns:
      null if OCSP URL is not specified or is not a HTTP or LDAP URL
